title: Unknown Pleasures
description: Bit of a shock, this was.

title: Strangeways
description: Lovely cheery record. Mostly acapella gospel songs, bit of James Galway, some clapping, nice perky choruses. Well done Stephen!

title: Hatful of Hollow
description: i am the son, and the heir, of a shyness that is criminaaaaally vulgar.

title: Closer
description: This is my wife's favourite record ever.
